definitions.definition: One of the great tendons situated in each side of the ham , or space back of the knee, and connected with the muscles of the back of the thigh.
The biceps femoris , semimembranosus , and semitendinosus muscles .

main_definition: ( anatomy ) One of the great tendons situated in each side of the ham , or space back of the knee, and connected with the muscles of the back of the thigh.
secondary_definitions: ( informal ) The biceps femoris , semimembranosus , and semitendinosus muscles .
